title: Marketplace Tech for Tuesday, April 21, 2015
description: Airing on Tuesday, April 21, 2015: First up, we'll talk with Lindsey Turrentine, Editor-in-Chief of cnet.com, about Mobilegeddon. Then, David Chao, Co-Founder and General Partner at DCM Ventures, join us to talk about investing in the marijuana market. And Keith McCarty, CEO and founder of Eaze (“Uber for pot”), on building technology for the marijuana market.
